1.title: A Watery Grave
1.plot: Jeff and Jeannine Glanda have a picture-perfect family until selfishness and a shameless affair mark the beginning of the end. As money troubles and the threat of divorce breed paranoia and hate, a plot is hatched in the dark heart of a twisted killer.

2.title: Behind Closed Doors
2.plot: Nurses Lara Crockett and Ricardo Muscolino meet on the night shift; he sets about creating a rich life for them, and she's happy to go along with it; Ricardo's scheming eventually drives Lara into the arms of another man with explosive results.

3.title: Love Gone Bankrupt
3.plot: A gold-digging socialite and a wealthy real estate mogul when Gary and Pam Triano's whirlwind romance results in marriage, shady business deals, betrayals and one very bitter custody battle, it leads to a climax that's nothing short of explosive.

4.title: The Bad Apple
4.plot: Francis Nicky Nicolosi and his devout new wife, Ellie, are living out the perfect retirement, then one of them is found dead in an apple orchard; police discover there's more to this seemingly frail and religious couple than anyone imagined.

5.title: Everybody Loves Rick
5.plot: Most high school romances end in heartbreak; however, Richard and Jolena rekindle their romance years later even though one of them is already married, and someone in this love triangle will wind up dead.

6.title: Ambition to Die For
6.plot: Longtime married couple Dino and Clara run a successful bail bond company. But when Dino's long hours and a missing bail jumper make Clara both suspicious and nervous, a hidden secret is all it takes to make this bond come undone in the blink of an eye.

7.title: Murder, Modesty, and the Pastor
7.plot: Corinne isn't a demanding woman - she just wants what many lonely people want: a second chance at love. And when she meets Calvin Stoudt she finally gets it. But a too-close roommate and a monstrous past turn this second chance into a deadly battleground.

8.title: Curtain Call to Hell
8.plot: Stephanie and Daniel are young, in love, and happily balancing work and play. But before long, tensions are set off by disappointment, self-loathing, and a mutual affection for the bottle. And by the final curtain call, only one of them is left standing.

9.title: Death Outranks Love
9.plot: It's a military match made in heaven for Roger and Margorie. But a tangled nest of financial secrets and twisted lies ruins the young couple's future. And while the rise of their careers and romance seems meteoric, the ensuing fall is deadly.

10.title: Living With the Devil
10.plot: When Darren and Elizabeth marry eight weeks after meeting, no one thinks it's a good idea, but the couple just doesn't care; then, one of them gets attacked, and a sniper is spotted across the way.

11.title: Deceitful Secrets
11.plot: Cecil and Larlane Brown have been together for years. But their secrets and lies, ignored and neglected for decades, threaten to turn their 50-year relationship into a bloody battleground.

13.title: Bored to Death
13.plot: When Opal Skidmore marries Steven Williams, their love is a second chance for the pair to live out their dreams; soon, boredom and the lure of the open road spark hidden desires and sexual hijinks, leaving this open marriage anything but happy.

1.title: Dead Silence
1.plot: Bob and Becky Klosterman are a model couple - fit, attractive and well spoken.Bob is a retired high ranking Navy commander and Becky a busy homemaker. Their life seems ideal, until one of them snaps. Suddenly, their prefect life explodes at the seams.

2.title: Blood and Wine
2.plot: When Nancy Lyon mysteriously dies in hospital, suspicions soon fall on her husband Richard. But soon other suspects are revealed: could it have been her brother? Did Nancy take her own life? Or did she deliberately try and frame her husband?

3.title: Secrets of a Dying Man
3.plot: Angelo Heddington and Elizabeth Rudavsky have a whirlwind romance that is followed by a shotgun wedding and news they're having a baby. But their union is built on layers of outrageous lies and the escalating violence will culminate in tragedy.

4.title: The Last Seduction
4.plot: Soon after John Pitman and Tracey Richter are married, John fears for his life. The family pets disappear, Tracey pulls a gun, and a private eye claims that Tracey is out to get him. But a neighbor ends up dead and Tracey says that John is behind it all.

5.title: Death in the Family
5.plot: Kraig and Karen Kahler enjoy a life of influence and privilege in the town of Weatherford Texas. Just beneath the surface of their marriage however lies a mix of sexual obsession and control that will spin out of control and destroy everything they have.

6.title: Lies and Death
6.plot: Donna and Gulam Moonda are the envy of many. She's an all-American girl and he's a wealthy doctor more than twenty years her senior. Their romance thrives, until a mystery gunman blows away the facade of perfection.

7.title: Your Cheatin' Heart
7.plot: Chris and Karon Pugh seem like a model working class couple living in a small seaside town. The neighbors admire their spotless house, and busy schedule. But the clean house hides some very dirty secrets that will result in unimaginable violence.

8.title: Exquisite Lies
8.plot: Daryl and Dante Sutorius, revel in the luxuries of their exclusive Cincinnati neighborhood. They have a pristine home with a Jaguar parked out front. But the newly married couple has dark secrets that will tragically unravel.

9.title: The Edge of Love
9.plot: High school sweethearts Bob Duke and Liana Davidson marry young and have their first baby soon after. But the shattered dreams of youth will plunge one of them to depths of despair - and the other to the bottom of a cliff.

10.title: The Pastor, His Wife, Their Son and His Mistress
10.plot: When detectives find Pauletta Burleson murdered outside her home, the evidence appears stacked against her husband Pastor Tracy Burleson. But a trail of strained relationships and a sordid love triangle soon reveal more than one person wanted her dead.

1.title: Half-Baked Alaska
1.plot: Angela Neal comes to Anchorage, Alaska to escape her checkered past. She falls in love and marries her counselor Mike Dixiano. But soon vices long buried will come back to haunt them... And demons from the past will drive one of them into the grave.

2.title: In a Lonely Place
2.plot: Michael Dally and Sherri Guess are a perfect match. But when Michael takes up with an alluring colleague named Diana in a not-so-secret affair, the fear of divorce will lead the couple down a dark path of jealousy, abuse, conspiracy... And human sacrifice.

3.title: Romance Reloaded
3.plot: High school sweethearts Michelle and Britt rekindle their romance after nearly 20 years apart. But this small-town Georgia family is a far cry from the Brady Bunch, bringing unseen baggage that unleashes a nightmare of infidelity, violence and murder.

4.title: An Inconvenient Marriage
4.plot: Cristobal Palacio helps Jennifer through a tough sickness, and she's grateful enough to marry him. But after they tie the knot, Jennifer discovers Cristobal's manic need to psychologically abuse her. The need worsens when she leaves him for another man.

5.title: Not in Kansas Anymore
5.plot: Kelly and Punkie are teenagers in love. They marry almost as soon as the law will allow, and plan to raise children in rural Kansas. But things take a deadly turn when they befriend Tammy and Jerry, a sexually adventurous couple with a need for speed.

6.title: The Other Side of the Tracks
6.plot: When Ed Postma, a Florida truck driver with a bad boy reputation, meets single mom Jackie Rosser, sparks fly. But when Ed straightens out to become a family man, new bad boys are waiting, and the spark dies, taking another casualty as collateral damage.

7.title: Unholy Trinity
7.plot: When boredom sets in, Iowa husband Tonch Weldon convinces wife Amanda to try an open marriage. However, when a love triangle forms which Tonch didn't expect, the situation turns deadly.

8.title: Black Pearl
8.plot: Tammy Ellis likes bad boys and charismatic loner David Gatlin is right up her street. After a quickie marriage, David's dark history is revealed; an attempted divorce is the catalyst for a terrifying and bloody confrontation.

9.title: Final Notice
9.plot: After a rocky start, and a bad gamble on the stock market, Shari and Dwight Tobyne escape their small-town roots to start over. But financial fraud is soon revealed, turning this marriage into a web of deception - and ultimately a gruesome tragedy.

10.title: Descent Into Madness
10.plot: Janene and Troy Patton are madly in love. But with 4 kids, and unexplained black holes in the family bank accounts, they are on the brink of financial disaster. Then when Janene claims one of her psychiatric patients raped her, the fallout proves deadly.

11.title: Dazed and Deadly
11.plot: Amanda Hornsby falls for Woody Smith, who is nothing like her first husband, who stole her money. But, Woody has baggage of his own. A toxic cocktail of jealously, infidelity and energy drinks plunges them both into an abyss of sex and violence.

12.title: Black Widow
12.plot: On July 1, 1977 Sharon and Nelson are married for the second time. By all appearances the popular couple are poised to beat odds, and make their marriage work this time around. The previous year, when Sharon first moved to Rocky Ford, Colorado with her husband and two kids, she and wealthy town optometrist Perry Nelson developed an immediate connection. Both were trapped and unhappy in failing marriages and soon found companionship with each other. Sharon was married to a controlling Seven Adventist preacher, Mike Fuller, while Perry Nelson no longer felt any spark in...

13.title: Burning Love
13.plot: Hattie Rennolds is struggling to provide for her daughter in Baton Rouge when she meets her dream man. Within a year they're married and Hattie is pregnant. But when they divorce, chaos enters an already volatile custody dispute, and someone ends up dead.

1.title: Mid-Life Murder
1.plot: Arthur Burney believes it's true love when he runs off with Patricia Meeks, the waitress from his favorite bar. And soon Arthur and Patricia have a daughter of their own. But 16 years later, tensions are stretched to the limit, and someone will snap.

2.title: Death of a Salesman
2.plot: John Parker marries Judy, a nice girl from the wrong side of the tracks. John uses his wealth and status to keep his new wife happy. But Judy's rumored romantic entanglements with a string of John's employees prove to be too much for John to bear.

3.title: Big League Murder
3.plot: Tommy and Tamara Kane appear to have it all. He's a pro football player for the Seattle Seahawks; she's a devoted mother living in Montreal. Distance keeps this couple together, but when Tommy's career ends, the proximity will tear them apart.

4.title: Murder by Proxy
4.plot: Marcia's relationship with a trucker causes resentment on the part of her teenage daughter and sets off a chain reaction leading to six arrests and one dead body.

5.title: Death for Dessert
5.plot: Sparks fly when picture-perfect divorcés Tami and Alan meet at a wedding - within months they're married too. But when Tami starts uses her sultry good looks to get what she wants from every man she meets, one of them will end up dead.

6.title: Killing Time
6.plot: Karla and Ray Porter are the envy of their neighbors. But after more than 20 years of marriage, Karla's loyalties are no longer with Ray.

7.title: Hanging by a Thread
7.plot: Tanya Buschman is just getting out of a nasty marriage when she falls for handsome Michel Bérubé, a bartender in Montreal. But it's not long before jealousy becomes foreplay for a suspicious suicide that has friends pointing fingers at friends.

8.title: Hunting Season
8.plot: Larry thinks Tammy is having an affair. When the two go on a hunting trip together, one of them becomes the hunted.

9.title: No Accident
9.plot: High school baseball coach Russell Stager's marriage to Barbara ends in a betrayal that will push one of them over the edge.

10.title: The Devil Inside
10.plot: When music promoter Tony Smith finds former actress, Lilius Landrum, he marries her. But Tony soon learns that Lilius is still legally married to someone else. The couple sets off together down a dark path that ends with the most horrific sin of all.

11.title: Bloody Matrimony
11.plot: Steve Dingle, a young Filipino immigrant, returns to his homeland to find a bride. It seems like a match made in heaven when he meets Cathy. But pressure builds in their marriage that will explode into infidelity, violence, and murder.

12.title: Broken Dreams
12.plot: The only thing going for Christina Corrigan is Keith Belajonas, a cute 25-year-old she meets online. After a couple of years and kids, they marry. But the honeymoon won't last long, and the jagged edges of their broken dreams will lead to a blood bath.

13.title: Death in Vegas
13.plot: John and Evie Watson manage to bridge the gap between their ages, cultures and languages. But after more than a quarter century of marriage-the pillars of their love have crumbled to pieces causing tempers to flare and secrets to be uncovered.

1.title: You Only Die Once
1.plot: Wild-child Kim is on a mission to turn her life around when she meets Frank, a beacon of stability. They say opposites attract-but in this case it's fatal attraction.

2.title: Crazy Love
2.plot: Pamela and Michael fall back in love, twenty years after the high school sweethearts break up. But the issues that first drove them apart have intensified over the years-and their second chance at love turns deadly.

3.title: Country Killer
3.plot: Rodeo start Matt Allen finds southern comfort in the arms of country girl Elsie Wells. Until she finds his best friend-and they all discover a thick gumbo of trouble.

4.title: Jaws of Death
4.plot: Charlie and Christine search for a simpler life in Vermont. But a terrible car crash uncovers secrets so complicated, they're deadly.

5.title: Murder in Store
5.plot: Jerry Barker falls hard for Rebecca after the death of his first wife-and together they open a general store. But the shelf-life on their happiness is short-lived-and when it comes to murder, practice doesn't make perfect.

6.title: Collision Course
6.plot: Mike is a master mechanic whose courtship with Ellen is fast and furious, but their union is on a collision course with tragedy.

7.title: Second Chance at Death
7.plot: After falling in love at their 10-year high school reunion, money troubles cause Antoinette and Spencer's marriage to flounder with tragic consequences.

8.title: The Harder They Fall
8.plot: Tom and Juanita Richardson's second honeymoon ends with a deadly fall from a cliff overlooking Lake Superior.

9.title: Death Brawl
9.plot: A handsome U.S. Marine lands the woman of his dreams, but the pressures of a long-distance relationship push these newlyweds to the edge.

10.title: Fall from Grace
10.plot: David Bush believes his wife, Lynn, has left him because of his infidelities, and he doesn't report her missing until the day after she disappears, never to be see again.

11.title: Sex, Lies and Secret Texts
11.plot: When free-spirited bartender Cassie meets family-guy Brent, the spark is intense, but it is doomed to explode and end with the snuffing out of a bright light.

12.title: Murder in the Cards
12.plot: A blackjack habit leads to tragedy for Gary and Helen, landing one of them behind bars and the other six feet under.

13.title: At Death's Door
13.plot: Millionaire aerospace executives, Lynn and Manfred Schockner hide a twisted rage that ends in a deadly conspiracy.

1.title: The Lewis Case
1.plot: While mourning the death of his wife, Julian falls hard for his much younger coworker, Teresa; for a time, Teresa's spunk lifts Julian's spirits until a sordid affair plunges him into an abyss.

2.title: The Bechler Case
2.plot:

3.title: The Bitterman Case
3.plot: Carli marries a police officer who takes his role as protector a little too seriously; Carli attempts to break free from the confines of wedlock, setting off a chain of deadly events.

4.title: The Yunk Basse Case
4.plot:

5.title: Deadly Obsession
5.plot: Tom and Lynette's love story spans decades from grade school to a posh house with a pool, but dark secrets from the bedroom bleed into other aspects of their marriage, and a dangerous obsession shreds their relationship into pieces.

6.title: The Griffith Case
6.plot:

7.title: Bonnell
7.plot: Janice and Jeff Bonnell move to Port Lavaca, Texas hoping for a fresh start when a a hit and run accident ends their plans. Police are skeptical from the start and rule this death homicide, rather than accident.

8.title: The Clark Case

imdb.plot outline: When marriages fail, divorce can turn ugly and even deadly. What was once a passionate union becomes spite, greed, backstabbing, and betrayal. 'Fatal Vows explores tumultuous, shocking, and high-stake divorces and the deadly murders linked to them. Guiding viewers through these passionate accounts of love gone wrong are Dr. Stacy Kaiser, a psychotherapist and relationship expert, and Dr. Brian Russell, a forensic psychologist and attorney. From husbands, wives, children, grandparents, mistresses and friends, divorce can lead even the most unthinkable people to commit murder.
imdb.title: Fatal Vows
plot: When marriages fail, divorce can turn ugly and even deadly. What was once a passionate union becomes spite, greed, backstabbing, and betrayal. '_Fatal Vows_ (qv) explores tumultuous, shocking, and high-stake divorces and the deadly murders linked to them. Guiding viewers through these passionate accounts of love gone wrong are Dr. Stacy Kaiser, a psychotherapist and relationship expert, and Dr. Brian Russell, a forensic psychologist and attorney. From husbands, wives, children, grandparents, mistresses and friends, divorce can lead even the most unthinkable people to commit murder.::Investigation Discovery
